name: ticket
description: Durable project planning with file-based tickets. Use for project-level tasks that need to persist across sessions and context handoffs. Tickets are stored as markdown files in .tickets/ directory.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The ticket command to run: create, start, close, reopen, status, dep, undep, link, unlink, ls, list, ready, blocked, closed, show, edit, add-note, query, dep tree, dep cycle

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Arguments for the command. For 'create': title string. For 'start/close/reopen/show': ticket ID. For 'status': ticket ID and status. For 'dep/undep': ticket ID and dependency ID. For 'ls/list': optional filters like --status=open. Use partial ID matching.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options as a single string. For 'create': -d 'description' -t type -p priority --tags tag1,tag2. For 'ls': --status=X -a assignee -T type. For 'closed': --limit=N
